OOC: Sorry about that Airshadow.  Combining replies for everyone.

BIC:

Tu=
cson gives Talon a thoughtful smile and gently holds her hand for a few ten=
der moments.

" The most important thing Talon, is your saftey.  If all els=
e fails, whatever happens, if we lose this battle or if we win it, what mat=
ters most to me, is your saftey, and the saftey of all others."

He turns h=
is head in Rodimus's direction.

" I almost forgot about who would look aft=
er the Ark, very good point Rodimus.  Quickstride, I'd like you to remain b=
ehind with Rodimus as backup.  He'll need you, since you seem to be able to=
 hear and smell things from far distances."

Quickstride salutes.

"Yes sir=
, I'll make sure nothing comes between us and the Ark."

As Tucson acknowle=
dges everyone, Straight Shot nodds, and quickly transforms into her cross b=
ow mode, while leaping up into Kup's hands. She also acomidates herself to =
his hand grip, to make it easier for him to implement her.

" Ready when yo=
u are Kup.  My mechanisms are the same as a conventional cross bow, but I m=
ay appear much lighter than the traditional weapon.  I was designed like th=
at for quick use, and precision."

Tucson turns his head to Kup.

" Don't w=
orry if you think you're going to miss a target, Straight Shot knows how to=
 compensate for that.  She can also help align her target and she will let =
you know when to fire if you think you need her guidence."

Rat Trap nodds =
to Windlord.

"Hey, Windlords got a point guys, when do we head out?"

Tucs=
on turns to Rat Trap.

" We begin now.  But we are not going to charge into=
 battle, seeing that Hydras may suspect our movements.  Cheetor, I trust yo=
ur instincts to the fullest, what I'd like you to do, is scout the paramete=
rs first.  Once you determine if the coast is clear, relay that to me, and =
then, we will slowly move into position in the areas Cheetor deems fit.  I =
also suggest we go in seperate teams.  Several at a time, spread out, and g=
o unseen.   Rat Trap, Windlord, you will travel with Night Shift, seeing th=
at he is well versed in stealth combat.  He will get you to the fortress qu=
ietly, and under the noses of our enemy."

Night Shift turns to Perceptor.
=

" That's cool with me.  Perceptor, if ya could, send me a download of the =
base parameters, so I know where I'm drivn'.  If I get lost, I could get di=
stracted, and then we're in really deep scrap.  The key ta how I operate is=
 me keepn' my mind on where it has ta be."

Quickstride looks to Rodimus.

=
" If ya don't mind, I think you better station me outside, on top of the Ar=
k, so I can keep an ear out for trouble.  That way, if something happens, I=
 can alert you guys."

Tucson's expression becomes as Resulte as Rodimus's.=
  Now it was time, it was time to show Hydras that with the strength of fai=
th and unity, no other power could overshadow the Maximal's or the Autobots=
 greatest attributes.  

"Rodimus is correct in his statements. It's time t=
o repay our debt to Hydras, and reverse what destruction he has inflicted o=
n this planet, and on everyone who innocently suffered needlessly under his=
 regime.  Now, we begin.  Cheetor, I'd like you to begin a scan of the para=
meters, and report back to me, as soon as you feel it's safe to continue, N=
ight Shift, Windlord, and Rat Trap will begin phase two.  Phase three will =
involve myself, Talon, Lord Elder, and then you will rejoin me for that as =
well.  While that happens, Rodimus, Stanton, Bump,and Quickstride, will rem=
ain here, to be sure the Ark is kept safe.  Rodimus, as soon as Quickstride=
 alerts you, that is the time to make your move.  We aren't leaving anythin=
g to chance, and with our bases covered, we need not worry about that.  But=
 be cautious, watch your backs at all times, for anything can happen to any=
one, and we must not become too overconfident of our abilities, but be caut=
ious as we implement them.  Most of all, good luck and keep safe."

Tucson =
turns to Cheetor.

" Cheetor, you may begin.  And good speed to you comrade=
."

He puts a gentile hand on Cheetor's shoulder.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Rodimus stood looking =
at the others and nodded a look of cold resolve
> on his face. "Hydras need=
s to be put out of commission once and for
> all."
> 
> "I will stay here a=
t the Ark to keep watch over it." He shrugged
> slightly, "With most of the=
 force leaving, we need someone to watch
> it." He crossed his arms over hi=
s chest, "With Legacy, Santon and Bump
> here, we should be able to hold up=
 for a while."
> 
> Lord Elder looked around, his optics intent and cautiou=
s, "Remember,
> Hydras has a very strong force over there, equal to ours, a=
t least in
> numbers." Elder looked over at the monitor, "Some of our force=
s are on
> patrol; I will alert them should you guys need some back up."
> =

> Cheetor nods emphatically as the others talk and discuss battle plans.
>=
 He looked over at Tuscon, "I will travel with you. You may need the
> back=
 up."
> 
> Rodimus opened a commlink with the medbay where Perceptor, Legac=
y,
> Bump and Santon were trying to work on Nightlight, "How are things
> g=
oing in there? We could use Perceptor out here to help us to take
> Hydras'=
 base."
